SELECT PC.PROGRAM_NAME, PC.COMPANY_NAME, A.CREATED_DATE, A.APPLY_MEMBER_STATUS, A.MEMBER_ID FROM TBL_APPLY A JOIN ( SELECT P.PROGRAM_NAME, C.COMPANY_NAME, P.ID FROM TBL_PROGRAM P JOIN TBL_COMPANY C ON C.ID = P.COMPANY_ID ) PC ON PC.ID = A.PROGRAM_ID
WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{id}
SELECT P.ID, C.COMPANY_NAME, P.PROGRAM_NAME, P.CREATED_DATE, P.PROGRAM_END_DATE, P.PROGRAM_STATUS FROM TBL_PROGRAM P JOIN TBL_COMPANY C ON P.COMPANY_ID = C.ID

SELECT P.ID, C.COMPANY_NAME, P.PROGRAM_NAME, P.CREATED_DATE, P.PROGRAM_END_DATE, P.PROGRAM_STATUS, P.PROGRAM_DETAIL, P.PROGRAM_PRICE, P.PROGRAM_BENEFIT, P.PROGRAM_THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_PROGRAM P JOIN TBL_COMPANY C ON P.COMPANY_ID = C.ID WHERE P.ID = #{id}

SELECT P.ID, C.COMPANY_NAME, P.PROGRAM_NAME, P.PROGRAM_END_DATE, P.PROGRAM_THUMBNAIL_PATH, P.CATEGORY_C_ID, CEIL(TO_DATE(PROGRAM_END_DATE)-SYSDATE) DDAY FROM TBL_PROGRAM P JOIN TBL_COMPANY C ON P.COMPANY_ID = C.ID

SELECT P.ID, C.COMPANY_NAME, P.PROGRAM_NAME, P.PROGRAM_END_DATE, P.PROGRAM_THUMBNAIL_PATH, P.CATEGORY_C_ID FROM TBL_PROGRAM P JOIN TBL_COMPANY C ON P.COMPANY_ID = C.ID WHERE P.CATEGORY_C_ID = #{categoryCId}

SELECT P.ID, P.PROGRAM_NAME, P.CREATED_DATE, P.PROGRAM_END_DATE, CC.CATEGORY_C_NAME, P.PROGRAM_DETAIL, P.PROGRAM_PRICE, P.PROGRAM_BENEFIT, C.COMPANY_NAME, P.CATEGORY_C_ID, C.COMPANY_ESTABLISHMENT, C.COMPANY_ADDRESS, C.COMPANY_LOGO_PATH, C.COMPANY_WELFARE, C.COMPANY_CULTURE, C.COMPANY_INTRODUCE FROM TBL_PROGRAM P JOIN TBL_COMPANY C ON P.COMPANY_ID = C.ID JOIN TBL_CATEGORY_C CC ON P.CATEGORY_C_ID = CC.ID WHERE P.ID = #{id}
